00028 template <typename T>

00030   // --------
00031   // typedefs

00033 
00034   typedef T                                       graph_type;
00035 
00036   typedef typename graph_type::vertex_descriptor  vertex_descriptor;
00037   typedef typename graph_type::edge_descriptor    edge_descriptor;
00038 
00039   typedef typename graph_type::vertex_iterator    vertex_iterator;
00040   typedef typename graph_type::edge_iterator      edge_iterator;
00041   typedef typename graph_type::adjacency_iterator adjacency_iterator;
00042 
00043   typedef typename graph_type::vertices_size_type vertices_size_type;
00044   typedef typename graph_type::edges_size_type    edges_size_type;

00049 
00050   graph_type g;
00051 
00052   vertex_descriptor vdA;

00074   // setUp

00077   // directed, sparse, unweighted
00078   // possibly connected
00079   // possibly cyclic
00080   // Collins, 2nd, pg. 653
00081   void setUp () {
00082     vdA  = add_vertex(g);
00083     vdB  = add_vertex(g);
00084     vdC  = add_vertex(g);
00085     vdD  = add_vertex(g);
00086     vdE  = add_vertex(g);
00087     vdF  = add_vertex(g);
00088     vdG  = add_vertex(g);
00089     vdH  = add_vertex(g);
00090     edAB = add_edge(vdA, vdB, g).first;
00091     edAC = add_edge(vdA, vdC, g).first;
00092     edAE = add_edge(vdA, vdE, g).first;
00093     edBD = add_edge(vdB, vdD, g).first;
00094     edBE = add_edge(vdB, vdE, g).first;
00095     edCD = add_edge(vdC, vdD, g).first;
00096     edDE = add_edge(vdD, vdE, g).first;
00097     edDF = add_edge(vdD, vdF, g).first;
00098     edFD = add_edge(vdF, vdD, g).first;
00099     edFH = add_edge(vdF, vdH, g).first;
00100     edGH = add_edge(vdG, vdH, g).first;
00101   }
00102 
00103   // -------------
00104   // test_add_edge
00105   // -------------
00106 
00107   void test_add_edge1() {
00108     std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool> p = add_edge(vdA, vdB, g);
00109     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.first  == edAB);
00110     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.second == false);
00111   }
00112 
00113   void test_add_edge2() {
00114     std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool> p = add_edge(vdE, vdG, g);
00115     adjacency_iterator b = adjacent_vertices(vdE, g).first;
00116     adjacency_iterator e = adjacent_vertices(vdE, g).second;
00117     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::distance(b, e) == 1);
00118     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*b == vdG);
00119     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.second == true);
00120     remove_edge(vdE, vdG, g);
00121   }
00122

00379   // -------------
00380   // test_vertices
00381   // -------------
00382 
00383   void test_vertices () {
00384     std::pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator> p = vertices(g);
00385     vertex_iterator                             b = p.first;
00386     vertex_iterator                             e = p.second;
00387     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b != e);
00388     vertex_descriptor vd = *b;
00389     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdA);
00390     ++b;
00391     vd = *b;
00392     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdB);
00393   }
00394 
00395   // ----------
00396   // test_edges
00397   // ----------
00398 
00399   void test_edges () {
00400     std::pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator> p = edges(g);
00401     edge_iterator                           b = p.first;
00402     edge_iterator                           e = p.second;
00403     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b != e);
00404     edge_descriptor ed = *b;
00405     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ed == edAB);
00406     ++b;
00407     ed = *b;
00408     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ed == edAC);
00409   }
00410 
00411   // ----------------------
00412   // test_adjacent_vertices
00413   // ----------------------
00414 
00415   void test_adjacent_vertices () {
00416     std::pair<adjacency_iterator, adjacency_iterator>
00417       p = adjacent_vertices(vdA, g);
00418     adjacency_iterator b = p.first;
00419     adjacency_iterator e = p.second;
00420     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b != e);
00421     vertex_descriptor vd = *b;
00422     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdB);
00423     ++b;
00424     vd = *b;
00425     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdC);
00426   }
00427 
00428   // --------------
00429   // test_has_cycle
00430   // --------------
00431 
00432   void test_has_cycle1() {
00433     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cs::has_cycle(g));
00434   }
00435 
00436   void test_has_cycle2() {
00437     remove_edge(vdD, vdF, g);
00438     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!cs::has_cycle(g));
00439     edDF = add_edge(vdD, vdF, g).first;
00440   }
00441 
00442   // ---------------------
00443   // test_topological_sort
00444   // ---------------------
00445 
00446   void test_topological_sort () {
00447     std::ostringstream out;
00448     remove_edge(vdD, vdF, g);
00449     cs::topological_sort(g, std::ostream_iterator<vertex_descriptor>(out, " "));
00450     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(out.str() == "4 3 1 2 0 7 5 6 ");
00451     edDF = add_edge(vdD, vdF, g).first;
00452   }
